item.selector: UPDATE b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_company.uuc_developer d on a.developer_uid=d.developer_id inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register r on a.uid=r.bid_announcement_uid inner join b2b_user_business.business_card_record c on r.mobile=c.mobile SET r.register_user_id=c.user_id WHERE a.procurement_type=1 AND r.register_user_id='' AND ISNULL(r.mobile)!='';
